page.title: 19WEEKENDS
page.content: On Saturday I have a lie in until 8.30 then I have breakfast and watch T.V I usually try to help my mum around the house and in cooking the dinner.In the afternoon I often go swimming at our local leisure centre, and then afterwards I go to the cafeteria to buy crips and a drink. After tea I like to watch T.V or spend some time drawing pictures. I usually go to bed at about 8 o'clock. On Sunday I get up quite late and go to meetings with the rest of my family as we are Jehovah's Witnesses. After a nice dinner,we go to Bristol to visit my Nan. We stay with my Nan for tea,we often arrive home quite late,so I have to go to bed straight away as there is school the following day.I really love my weekends. L.S
